thread.title: What Stock Volatility Means for U.S. Consumers

author: Josh Zumbrun
title: What Stock Volatility Means for U.S. Consumers

organizations.name: stock volatility means for u.s. consumers

text:
The booming stock market of recent years helped propel U.S. consumers even as they struggled with tepid wage growth and a sluggish economy.
Market gyrations of recent days now raise the question of just how far those economic benefits will go.
The boost that the stock market provides to consumer spending is known among economists as the â€œwealth...
